about_the_game:
FinalCypher is team-based strategic FPS that's powered by ground-breaking technology to empower players to govern and modd gameplay. The gameplay takes place in a cyberpunk-styled environments with multiple characters you can choose from. Players needs to decipher a crypto-wallet that holds a massive amount of money in order to win. First to complete 13 rounds wins. Characters have different stats and role that suits different playing styles.


FinalCypher: by Station Zero X (FC:0x) expands upon the team-based action gameplay.

How to play FinalCypher?
- Download the game launcher from station0x.
- Run the game launcher and after the account creation, activate your account using the invitation link sent to your email.

How will you explore the world of FinalCypher?

FinalCypher is a Futuristic strategy FPS game, set in a future world powered by groundbreaking technology that gives players the freedom to play how they want: exploring, crafting, mining or governing in a uniquely moddable, open-source adventure.

name: FinalCypher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: inter core 2 duo 2.4 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA

short_description: FinalCypher is a community-governed free-to-play team-based strategic hero FPS game developed by Station Zero X. FinalCypher utilizes bleeding-edge technology to empower players to truly own their in-game assets. Join the Kill-to-Earn era.
